一.english: one / 1 / single / a (article) / as soon as / entire / whole / all / throughout / "one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1) / also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

百.english: hundred / numerous / all kinds of / surname Bai

千.english: thousand / see 鞦韆|秋千[qiu1 qian1]

万.english: see 万俟[Mo4 qi2] / ten thousand / a great number / surname Wan

零.english: zero / nought / zero sign / fractional / fragmentary / odd (of numbers) / (placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one) / fraction / (in mathematics) remainder (after division) / extra / to wither and fall / to wither

一点儿.english: erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]

两.english: two / both / some / a few / tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

几.english: small table / almost / how much / how many / several / a few

多少.english: number / amount / somewhat / how much? / how many? / (phone number, student ID etc) what number?

一些.english: some / a few / a little / (following an adjective) slightly ...er

同学.english: to study at the same school / fellow student / classmate

服务员.english: waiter / waitress / attendant / customer service personnel

老板.english: variant of 老闆|老板[lao3 ban3] / Robam (brand) / boss / business proprietor

吃.english: to eat / to consume / to eat at (a cafeteria etc) / to eradicate / to destroy / to absorb / to suffer / to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2]) / variant of 吃[chi1]

喝.english: to drink / variant of 嗬[he1] / to shout

说.english: to persuade / to speak / to say / to explain / to scold / to tell off / a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory) / variant of 說|说[shuo1]

看.english: to look after / to take care of / to watch / to guard / to see / to look at / to read / to watch / to visit / to call on / to consider / to regard as / to look after / to treat (an illness) / to depend on / to feel (that) / (after verb) to give it a try / Watch out! (for a danger)

听.english: smile (archaic) / to listen / to hear / to obey / a can (loanword from English "tin") / classifier for canned beverages / (literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule / to sentence / to allow

读.english: comma / phrase marked by pause / to read / to study / reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

工作.english: to work / (of a machine) to operate / job / work / task

睡觉.english: to go to bed / to sleep

卖.english: to sell / to betray / to spare no effort / to show off or flaunt

开.english: to open / to start / to turn on / to boil / to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc) / to operate (a vehicle) / carat (gold) / abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2] / abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

关.english: mountain pass / to close / to shut / to turn off / to concern / to involve / surname Guan

坐.english: to sit / to take a seat / to take (a bus, airplane etc) / to bear fruit / variant of 座[zuo4] / surname Zuo

站.english: station / to stand / to halt / to stop / branch of a company or organization / website

走.english: to walk / to go / to run / to move (of vehicle) / to visit / to leave / to go away / to die (euph.) / from / through / away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3]) / to change (shape, form, meaning)

跑步.english: to run / to jog / (military) to march at the double

旅游.english: trip / journey / tourism / travel / tour / to travel

帮助.english: assistance / aid / to help / to assist

洗.english: to wash / to bathe / to develop (photo)

穿.english: to wear / to put on / to dress / to bore through / to pierce / to perforate / to penetrate / to pass through / to thread

起床.english: to get out of bed / to get up

年.english: year / grain / harvest (old) / variant of 年[nian2] / surname Nian

日.english: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan / sun / day / date, day of the month

星期.english: week / day of the week / Sunday

点.english: point / dot / drop / speck / o'clock / point (in space or time) / to draw a dot / to check on a list / to choose / to order (food in a restaurant) / to touch briefly / to hint / to light / to ignite / to pour a liquid drop by drop / (old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1] / dot stroke in Chinese characters / classifier for items

现在.english: now / at present / at the moment / modern / current / nowadays

以后.english: after / later / afterwards / following / later on / in the future

春.english: old variant of 春[chun1] / spring (season) / gay / joyful / youthful / love / lust / life / surname Chun

夏.english: summer / the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC / Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432) / surname Xia

秋.english: autumn / fall / harvest time / old variant of 秋[qiu1] / see 鞦韆|秋千[qiu1 qian1] / surname Qiu

冬.english: winter / (onom.) beating a drum / rat-a-tat / surname Dong

岁.english: variant of 歲|岁[sui4], year / years old / classifier for years (of age) / year / year (of crop harvests)

家.english: see 傢伙|家伙[jia1 huo5] / home / family / (polite) my (sister, uncle etc) / classifier for families or businesses / refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China / noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian

北京.english: Beijing, capital of People's Republic of China / Peking / PRC government

机场.english: airport / airfield / (slang) service provider for Shadowsocks or similar software for circumventing Internet censorship

超市.english: supermarket / abbr. for 超級市場|超级市场

客厅.english: drawing room (room for arriving guests) / living room

楼上.english: upstairs / (Internet slang) previous poster in a forum thread

左边.english: left / the left side / to the left of

右边.english: right side / right, to the right

前面.english: ahead / in front / preceding / above / also pr. [qian2 mian5]

后面.english: rear / back / behind / later / afterwards / also pr. [hou4 mian5]

菜.english: dish (type of food) / vegetable / cuisine / (coll.) (one's) type / (of one's skills etc) weak / poor

水.english: water / river / liquid / beverage / additional charges or income / (of clothes) classifier for number of washes / surname Shui

肉.english: meat / flesh / pulp (of a fruit) / (coll.) (of a fruit) squashy / (of a person) flabby / irresolute / Kangxi radical 130

汤.english: rushing current / soup / hot or boiling water / decoction of medicinal herbs / water in which sth has been boiled / surname Tang

好.english: good / well / proper / good to / easy to / very / so / (suffix indicating completion or readiness) / (of two people) close / on intimate terms / (after a personal pronoun) hello / to be fond of / to have a tendency to / to be prone to

坏.english: bad / spoiled / broken / to break down / (suffix) to the utmost

大.english: big / huge / large / major / great / wide / deep / older (than) / oldest / eldest / greatly / very much / (dialect) father / father's elder or younger brother / see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

多.english: many / much / often / a lot of / numerous / more / in excess / how (to what extent) / multi- / Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

少.english: few / less / to lack / to be missing / to stop (doing sth) / seldom / young

热.english: to warm up / to heat up / hot (of weather) / heat / fervent

高兴.english: happy / glad / willing (to do sth) / in a cheerful mood

难过.english: to feel sad / to feel unwell / (of life) to be difficult

丑.english: clown / 2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox / ancient Chinese compass point: 30° / shameful / ugly / disgraceful / surname Chou

快.english: rapid / quick / speed / rate / soon / almost / to make haste / clever / sharp (of knives or wits) / forthright / plainspoken / gratified / pleased / pleasant

便宜.english: convenient / cheap / inexpensive / small advantages / to let sb off lightly

新.english: new / newly / meso- (chemistry) / abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1] / surname Xin

旧.english: old / opposite: new 新 / former / worn (with age)

难.english: difficult (to...) / problem / difficulty / difficult / not good / disaster / distress / to scold

瘦.english: thin / to lose weight / (of clothing) tight / (of meat) lean / (of land) unproductive

高.english: high / tall / above average / loud / your (honorific) / surname Gao

忙.english: busy / hurriedly / to hurry / to rush

累.english: to accumulate / to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4]) / continuous / repeated / tired / weary / to strain / to wear out / to work hard / rope / to bind together / to twist around / surname Lei

哪里.english: where? / somewhere / anywhere / wherever / nowhere (negative answer to question) / humble expression denying compliment / also written 哪裡|哪里 / where? / somewhere / anywhere / wherever / nowhere (negative answer to question) / humble expression denying compliment

怎么.english: how? / what? / why? / variant of 怎麼|怎么[zen3 me5]

是不是.english: is or isn't / yes or no / whether or not

有没有.english: (before a noun) Do (you, they etc) have ...? / Is there a ...? / (before a verb) Did (you, they etc) (verb, infinitive)? / Have (you, they etc) (verb, past participle)?

怎么样.english: how? / how about? / how was it? / how are things?

几岁.english: how old are you? (familiar, or to a child)

多大.english: how old? / how big? / how much? / so big / that much

对不对.english: right or wrong? / Is it right? / OK, yes? (colloquial)

车.english: car / vehicle / machine / to shape with a lathe / Kangxi radical 159 / war chariot (archaic) / rook (in Chinese chess) / rook (in chess) / surname Che

船.english: variant of 船[chuan2] / boat / vessel / ship

走路.english: to walk / to go on foot

坐车.english: to take the car, bus, train etc

骑车.english: to ride a bike (motorbike or bicycle)

票.english: ticket / ballot / banknote / person held for ransom / amateur performance of Chinese opera / classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

路.english: road / journey / route / line (bus etc) / sort / kind / surname Lu

出发.english: to set off / to start (on a journey)

酒店.english: wine shop / pub (public house) / hotel / restaurant / (Tw) hostess club

度假.english: to go on holidays / to spend one's vacation

太阳.english: sun / abbr. for 太陽穴|太阳穴[tai4 yang2 xue2]

云.english: (classical) to say / cloud / surname Yun / abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

山.english: mountain / hill / anything that resembles a mountain / bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons / gable / surname Shan

海.english: ocean / sea / great number of people or things / (dialect) numerous / surname Hai

树.english: tree / to cultivate / to set up

花.english: flower / blossom / fancy pattern / florid / to spend (money, time) / (coll.) lecherous / lustful / old variant of 花[hua1] / variant of 花[hua1] / flower / blossom / also pr. [wei3] / surname Hua

草.english: variant of 草[cao3] / grass / straw / manuscript / draft (of a document) / careless / rough / variant of 肏[cao4]
